segments.text: I am shocked at how oblivious the woman is to everything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring out of the sink, and she’s just standing there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are sneaking cookies, and she doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool like it’s nothing, and the girl is just waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t turned off the faucet yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting soaked, and she’s still just drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll ever realize what’s happening before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are going to get away with it unless she turns around soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m just amazed at how unaware she is of everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is one of the most surprising things I’ve ever seen.
segments.speaker: PAR
